title: 91/273/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 May 1991 on the lodging of applications for the premium for maintaining suckler cows in Ireland in respect of the 1991/92 marketing year (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 May 1991  on the lodging of applications for the premium for maintaining suckler cows in Ireland in respect of the 1991/92 marketing year  (Only the English text is authentic)  (91/273/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
Ireland is hereby authorized, in respect of the 1991/92 marketing year, to set 15 May 1991 as the beginning of the period during which applications for the premium for suckler cows are to be lodged.
This Decision shall apply without prejudice to the other provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 1244/82.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
